TopicTitle: Orion gets a silver, metallic-based thermal control coating

Articles.Content:
In light of the recent announcement, I thought I'd start a thread.

The Orion capsule will as of tonight, receive a silver, metallic-based thermal control coating that will be bonded to the TPS tiles.

[img]http://www.nasa.gov/sites/default/files/thumbnails/image/silver_1.jpeg[/img]

[url]http://www.nasa.gov/feature/engineers-refine-thermal-protection-system-for-orion-s-next-mission[/url]
